wikipedia_page.main: William Morton (21 April 1961 – 19 July 2019) was a Scottish cricketer who played with Warwickshire.A slow left arm orthodox bowler, Morton made his first-class debut in 1982 for Scotland in a match against Ireland. He appeared two more times at first-class level for the Scots and his other 10 games were for Warwickshire.
